project_experiences.name: AI Art Generation
project_experiences.description: Fine-tuned Stability AI’s Stable Diffusion XL text-to-image model using the Low Rank Adaptation (LoRA) technique. Used it to create concept anime art that was subsequently sold as an NFT and vector logos for branding projects.
highlights: Fine-tuned Stability AI’s Stable Diffusion XL text-to-image model using the Low Rank Adaptation (LoRA) technique. Used it to create concept anime art that was subsequently sold as an NFT and vector logos for branding projects.

project_experiences.name: Voice Controlled AI Robot
project_experiences.description: Built a robot using embedded systems like Arduino. Leveraged data science methods like PCA for dimensionality reduction and voice matching to enable it to respond to voice commands.
highlights: Built a robot using embedded systems like Arduino. Leveraged data science methods like PCA for dimensionality reduction and voice matching to enable it to respond to voice commands.

work_experiences.description: Built the founding software and concept for an AI system. Led the technical side of the pitch and secured the company a pre-seed round at a $1B valuation. Published an open-source package viewable on PyPI (refyre) to streamline local file management. Built a command-line interface allowing customers to access MongoDB and DigitalOcean data.
highlights: Built the founding software and concept for an AI system. Led the technical side of the pitch and secured the company a pre-seed round at a 1B valuation. Published an open-source package viewable on PyPI (refyre) to streamline local file management. Built a command-line interface allowing customers to access MongoDB and DigitalOcean data.

work_experiences.description: Utilized TensorFlow 2.0 to contribute to an AI-based product that automates sports (tennis), dance, yoga, and physiotherapy coaching. Developed a YOLO model and trained it to perform action recognition with 85% accuracy. Developed ball detection algorithms in C++ and patented the technology for sports like tennis.
highlights: Utilized TensorFlow 2.0 to contribute to an AI-based product that automates sports (tennis), dance, yoga, and physiotherapy coaching. Developed a YOLO model and trained it to perform action recognition with 85 percent accuracy. Developed ball detection algorithms in C++ and patented the technology for sports like tennis.

work_experiences.description: Worked on software development using Python to automate the process of calculating guide RNAs for various proteins. Utilized contemporary biotechnology AI software such as AlphaFold, Equidock, and Equibind for accuracy and prediction.
highlights: Worked on software development using Python to automate the process of calculating guide RNAs for various proteins. Utilized contemporary biotechnology AI software such as AlphaFold, Equidock, and Equibind for accuracy and prediction.
